author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

When added to cmsDriver  --customise RecoLocalCal/HcalRecProducers/M0defaultFullRange_cff.customiseM0
replaces MAHI with M0 "a la" Cosmics 
https://cmssdt.cern.ch/lxr/source/RecoLocalCalo/Configuration/python/RecoLocalCalo_Cosmics_cff.py#0022

#### PR validation:

Comparison of wf 11634.0 step3 w/wo this PR using edmConfigDump
looks as expected:

            correctForPhaseContainment = cms.bool(False),
vs
             correctForPhaseContainment = cms.bool(True),

             firstSampleShift = cms.int32(-999),
vs
             firstSampleShift = cms.int32(0),

             samplesToAdd = cms.int32(10),
vs
             samplesToAdd = cms.int32(2),

             useMahi = cms.bool(False)
vs
            useMahi = cms.bool(True)

         recoParamsFromDB = cms.bool(False),
vs
         recoParamsFromDB = cms.bool(True),


         sipmQNTStoSum = cms.int32(99),
         sipmQTSShift = cms.int32(-99),
vs
         sipmQNTStoSum = cms.int32(3),
         sipmQTSShift = cms.int32(0),

#### This is not a backport
title: HCAL: customisation snippet for full-range M0 default in HCAL reco
